Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am new to the forum but have played KSP for a while now and I decided to give something back. After all I have used the forum for inspiration on numerous occasions.

So this is me presenting Yeager Mk1. An SSTO carrying three Kerbals to 200km, docking with my space station and safely landing back at the space center with dV to spare for the very necessary tower flyby.

Crew capacity: 3

Start mass: 30.709 t

Vessel cost: 91.67 M$

Part count: 79

Action Groups:

1. Activate TurboJet Engine - Shutdown Aerospike Engine

2. Activate Aerospike Engine - Shutdown TurboJet Engine

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5eDsymBJt_Kdlo0akdsd3NDVGM/edit?usp=sharing
